mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_id, imp_uid, merchant_uid, amount, pay_status, paid_at, pay_method, card_name, card_number_masked) VALUES (#{userId}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{amount}, #{payStatus}, NOW(), #{payMethod}, #{cardName}, #{cardNumberMasked})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, imp_uid AS impUid, merchant_uid AS merchantUid, amount, pay_status AS payStatus, paid_at AS paidAt, cancelled_at AS cancelledAt, pay_method AS payMethod, card_name AS cardName, card_number_masked AS cardNumberMasked FROM payment WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid}

SELECT id, user_id AS userId, imp_uid AS impUid, merchant_uid AS merchantUid, amount, pay_status AS payStatus, paid_at AS paidAt, cancelled_at AS cancelledAt, pay_method AS payMethod, card_name AS cardName, card_number_masked AS cardNumberMasked FROM payment WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY paid_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET pay_status = #{payStatus}, imp_uid = #{impUid}, paid_at = NOW(), pay_method = #{payMethod}, card_name = #{cardName}, card_number_masked = #{cardNumberMasked} WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid}
